Text: tripHi Just thought I would let you know that Mom and Dad are not coming here for a visit as Mom is Having problems with her back and cant travel I tried anyway We are still planning on coming on the th and will go spend the day with them on the th Meg bought a new car Saturday silverblue VW Pissat Guess who will be buying her old car Dad wants a smaller car to run to the store etc so he couldnt turn it down He still makes remarks about having to give up the Acclaim so I hope this pacifies him Hope everything is OK down there The weather has been PicturePerfect here Lyn is now telling people about the pregnancy but we havent told anyone in Hitchcock yet Thought we would do that when we go unless she tells them first Love Mom

cableHi You were right A different older man came today and wired the VCR separately We now use four remotes to run the system Each one has a different function depending on if we need the VCR for something The original TV remote is only good for the sourcetoggles between the two different inputs We have it figured out but anybody else would be stumped We cant record HBO but that is not a priority Hope we have no more problems Give the kids a kiss for us Love Mom

PaulHi Hope you are still getting email We really enjoyed our time with all of you and the Christmas program This is what we were told about Paul He figured he would be laid off so he got a job interview with Dynergy before things fell apart Apparently he was given the option to stay but decided he was a sure bet for the Dynergy job and turned down the offer When he went to Dynergy they told him they couldnt hire Enron employees because of the law suit so he is now jobless Bob thinks it was a stupid decision but Tom apparently thinks it was the thing to do Guess only time will tell Love Mom

sundayHi Just to let you know we are planning to go to Conroe on Sunday for a few hours visit and then immediately return home That seems the best day to take them to lunch and get back by dark We are also feeding the neighbors dogs etc while they are gone so we need to get back Hope Lauren is feeling better and everyone else is OK Got my fingers crossed that the weather holds thru the first of the year and that no one is sick Love Mom

forgotHi Think I forgot to tell you that Ken has a daughter born almost two weeks ago so your Grandparents tell me Apparently Peg hasnt told Carolyn either Ive emailed her several times about the babys arrival and she promised to let me know Mom
BobHi Apparently Bob is heading back driving to Houston on Saturday via Phoenix They are planning to open their office near the Conroe airport Hang in there Mom

newsThere has been an article the last three days in the Tyler paper believe it or not Even your Dad broke down and decided maybe he better pay attention and broke his ban on reading the local paper Would Dynergy be good news Mom

tvHi Guess you are back safe and sound Hope you enjoyed the trip We are full of allergies again Robert Thornton works for the NBC affiliate in TYLER It is KETK but for some reason I cant access them on the computer He is the morning weatherman Dark hair thin and glasses and appears to be about the right age Lyn is still having problems and is miserable More later Mom
